1913520.title: The Last of Samual
1913520.description: Welcome to a new galaxy! You are Samual, a simple farmer that lives in a small abandoned town called First Valley. You live there with your daughter Sam who is the light of your world. One day you are attacked and your daughter is taken away from you!

1913530.title: DopeMine Arena
1913530.description: DopeMine Arena is a Bullet-Heaven Roguelite. Simple controls and auto-firing weapons put the focus on levelling up and making good choices to survive the onslaught of enemies. Earn coins to increase the stats of your characters. Discover the weapons and items that pair together .

1913550.title: Aces Under the Moonlight™
1913550.description: Action Sports is about to get a shot of pure fire. Run, jump, and Airdash your way to victory in this hand animated, high speed, punk-inspired ball game set against backgrounds of urban decay. Get ready an absolutely electric experience.

1913580.title: 1000 hidden snails
1913580.description: Hidden object game in a surreal style. Extremely hard!

1913600.title: Sanator: Elmo's Legacy
1913600.description: Sanator: Elmo's Legacy is a branching visual novel that follows the adventures of a certain plague doctor. What secrets do the Ailur people hold, and who St. Elmo really was? Venture into the heart of the frozen Taiga and find the answers.

1913610.title: Art of Stunt
1913610.description: Become the king of stunts! Show off your stunt skills in a variety of movie scenes like a Hollywood action movie star!

1913650.title: WAVECADE
1913650.description: WAVECADE is a sci-fi, arcade-style, shoot-em-up where YOU control the speed of the game. Destroy blocks in style as you collect powerups and avoid hazards. How far can you go? Set your own rules and unlock your favourite mode to play.

1913700.title: Netspectre
1913700.description: Netspectre is a hacker roguelike set in a ruthless, cyberpunk universe. Infiltrate networks, improve your machine, navigate the challenges of daily life as a netspectre in a futuristic megacity, and perhaps even become one of its many legends!

1913780.title: PI.EXE
1913780.description: Take the role of an antivirus software within the world of an operating system, eliminating malware spawns in a challenging, platforming quest!

1913810.title: Beastmaster
1913810.description: Build, explore and survive in a struggle for survival against animals and mutants on a mysterious island.

1913870.title: Tray Racers!
1913870.description: The world ended…But the fun didn’t! Race solo, or with your pals across the adorable post-apocalyptic world of Tray Racers! Grab a tray, surf the dunes, and get ready to SLIDE, DRIFT and TRICK your way to the finish line in this cute and colorful party racer, built for online multiplayer! YAHOOOOOO!

1913900.title: Potatoes
1913900.description: Potatoes is a puzzle/platformer game in which you control multiple characters by recording what should they do. Make potatoes collaborate to reach the objective in 50 different levels of increasing difficulty!

1913970.title: PSYCHO
1913970.description: PSYCHO - is an exciting 3D shooter with hardcore elements where you will explore an abandoned psychiatric hospital playing as a fighter SWAT.

1914060.title: Super Mini Mart
1914060.description: Super Mini Mart is a cozy take on the management genre with a charming 3D aesthetic and an endearing cast of characters. Stock, supervise, and manage store activities in a laid-back environment, befriending locals and turning those one-off bargain hunters into life-long loyal customers!

1914140.title: Orkhon Inscriptions Mongolia VR
1914140.description: An animated VR tour to the Orkhon Inscriptions in Northern Mongolia. Old turkic runic inscriptions from AD 700-735. For Oculus Quest version please contact me.

1914150.title: Gunsmith Simulator
1914150.description: Become a gunsmith and work in your own workshop! Craft parts and make popular weapons with them. Repair and upgrade weapons in a state of damage.

1914190.title: Sharp Trouble
1914190.description: Sharp trouble - King, wake up, we're under attack! Evil barbarians have invaded your castle and are trying to take out the entire treasury - stop this outrage in this hardcore platformer!

1914200.title: Cosmoblaster Exodia
1914200.description: Cosmoblaster exodia - You are a brave captain of a galactic cruiser. Ruthlessly destroy the space pirates you meet on your way and collect bonuses that will help you in your difficult task!

1914240.title: Scapegoat
1914240.description: Scapegoat is a fun 2D top-down, Action Shooter game with cartoon and beautiful hand-drawn scenery. Fight multiple enemy animals, choosing and mastering an increasing variety of weapons to advance through the levels. Designed for both Keyboard/mouse or Gamepad controllers!

1914270.title: Ultimate Super Bean
1914270.description: A First-Person Free-For-All Bean Battle! Run Around On A Map That Changes Once A Month, And Use Guns That Also Cycle Out Often! Collect The Skins To Show That You're The Ultimate BEAN!!

1914330.title: Sprites at Play
1914330.description: Fast platforming, people hiding, others seeking. If you are the last one to be found you win!

1914390.title: Déjà Drift
1914390.description: Drift with yourself to get a high score in a vaporwave sandbox. Rack-up points to the sound of Eurobeat music.

1914430.title: PANDO Engines
1914430.description: A 2.5D, Online Co-op Party Game where players work together to create their own massive land engine. Whether the different threats by manning turrets, putting out fires, shoveling coal, repairing segments, and performing daily maintenance. How long will you survive?

1914460.title: Ancient Medieval Empire
1914460.description: Ancient Medieval Empire is a strategy game with RPG elements. A huge number of free castles and villages, which greatly attract the evil orcs. Manage your army, capture new castles and fight back against enemies. You have to capture as many castles as possible and drive away the orcs.

1914520.title: SudoKube
1914520.description: An enhanced sudoku experience, 6 times more fun

1914530.title: The D-T.E.A.M.
1914530.description: Dwarves. Tanks. Energy. Ammo. MMMGold! In this 3D Tank Blaster Platformer, you will take down an enemy mining facility, all the while finding energy pickups and collecting sweet gold. Double jump, speed boost, and blast your way to earn performance stars and achieve a personal best in time!

1914540.title: Parkonauts
1914540.description: Parkonauts is a physics-based co-op game for one to four players. Park cars, refuel and wash them to collect money for the next day!

1914550.title: Ruin or Victory
1914550.description: Ruin or Victory is a modern take on the classic RTS genre with added detail, continuity, and strategic depth while remaining accessible and well-paced.

1914570.title: Take the Throne
1914570.description: Take the Throne is a massively multiplayer battle royale game with up to 25 players in a free-for-all bloody fight to be the last one alive.

1914580.title: Spirit Hunters: Infinite Horde
1914580.description: You are the Spirit Hunters in this action rogue-lite. Slay huge waves of monsters and harvest their souls for ever increasing power. Unlock many playable characters, abilities, maps and more through a deep progression system.

1914630.title: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2022
1914630.description: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2022 puts you in the role of head coach of your favorite college basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from staff hiring, recruiting, scouting and all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to tournament glory and becoming a dynasty.

1914700.title: Elteria Hunter
1914700.description: The world of Elteria is full of magic and monsters, And the Elteria Hunters are there to fight these monsters and protect the regions from evil. Level up your skill grind for equipment and become the strongest hunter!

1914740.title: A HERO AND A GARDEN
1914740.description: Play as a fairytale hero and help him garden, since saving the princess didn't go that well. A fantasy gardening visual novel and clicker game.

1914770.title: TumbleWeed
1914770.description: An inventive merge of classic tower defense and roguelike looting. Towers are loot! Tower enhancements are loot! Consumables are loot! Adapt and use your resources wisely to make it to the end!

1914790.title: R'lyeh
1914790.description: A story-driven, open-world, Lovecraftian Horror and Survival game with a scifi twist.

1914850.title: Bubbles & Pearls
1914850.description: A VR arcade game that immerses you into an underwater experience, compete with your friends and family to achieve the longest dive and collect the highest number of pearls by collecting the bubbles that emerge from the abyss!

1914860.title: Overbowed
1914860.description: Explore a kingdom overrun by evil magic as you fight foes with your own magical bow.

1914890.title: Torden
1914890.description: A stylized 3rd person action fantasy game. Slash your way with many but simple attack mechanics. Select from dozens of spells to help in your battle. Featuring a wide array of enemies with different quirks that need your quick reflexes and patience to deal with.

1914900.title: Dragons On Desktop
1914900.description: Looking at these lovely dragons on Desktop makes me feel relaxed, free and happy. I hope to bring these emotions to you...

1914930.title: OZARK
1914930.description: A search and rescue gone wrong, crash landing in a remote mountain. A derelict facility, signals lost. Nothing is quite as it seems. Fight for your life in this side-scrolling action adventure and unravel the mysteries that lie beneath.

1914940.title: Zhijiang Town
1914940.description: 你是然比，在架空的小镇上肆无忌惮地和妹子们玩耍（绝对清纯）

1914950.title: Xpraize Beta for GameMaster
1914950.description: An innovative game to play a tabletop role-playing game in VR ! Let’s experience another side of RPGs. There are Game Master version and VR version. In this Game Master version, let's make VR players enjoy the game! You can also record players’ adventures like a movie director with various cameras.

1914970.title: Help Me Remember, Satori-sama!
1914970.description: Satori's overworked herself into bed, but Okuu needs help remembering things! You can't use her heart-reading power, and will instead have to ask questions and use her power of recollection to correct wrong info, all while enduring visits from Orin and Koishi as you deduce what Okuu's forgotten!

1914980.title: Golfing In Aether
1914980.description: Multiplayer minigolf designed around a procedural course layout allowing you to experience something different everytime you play. Support for both online play and four player split screen.

1915040.title: 无畏海域：征途

details.Title: 无畏海域：征途
details.Developer: 无锡上宸信息科技有限公司

1915040.description: In a certain sea area in the future, when your fleet is invincible, you will praise yourself for discovering this game!

1915050.title: End it, please ...
1915050.description: End it, please ... is a casual and challenging sci-fi platformer game where you have to find your ship to escape.

1915140.title: Malice in Magic Tower -玲鈴魔塔-

details.Title: Malice in Magic Tower -玲鈴魔塔-

1915140.description: "Malice in MagicTower -玲鈴魔塔-" is a magic tower (fixed-value strategy RPG) game. It's simple yet deep, and it's fun to improve your score through trial and error. Strengthen the main character, Malice, and defeat various enemies.

1915160.title: Night Blood : Avenger's Tide
1915160.description: "Night Blood: Avenger's Tide" is a side-scrolling action game that takes place in the world's most prosperous city, Atlandi. Players need to control Mark to find his own past, break through the enemy's siege, and finally uncover the huge conspiracy hidden behind the crisis.

1915170.title: Four Winds Fantasy
1915170.description: The speedrunning action/RPG you've been dreaming of! Take control of an elderly man who has been banished by the only town he's ever known. Discover insane secrets and multiple endings, compete on the leaderboards, now with full gamepad support!

1915180.title: 模拟医院-Simulated hospital
1915180.description: 模拟医院是一款模拟医院经营的沙盒养成游戏，整体风格轻松，硬核模仿医院运行，治病救人，救死扶伤，还要不断提升医院等级，最终达到三级特等医院水平。

1915210.title: The Mensional
1915210.description: Adventures of different characters with their unique atmosphere and puzzles.

1915220.title: SpectrumGames
1915220.description: The good old Mafia in a virtual space, as close to the offline version. Become the Game Master, invite players and build the game atmosphere as in real life! Or find an open room to join as a player.

1915300.title: Gematombe
1915300.description: Gematombe is an action-puzzle-vs-game where you can play one-on-one matches against your friends or the computer.

1915330.title: The Castle Of Time
1915330.description: This is a fighting platformer with a dynamic combat system where you have to fight enemies with your sword.

1915390.title: Empty War
1915390.description: "You're the best warrior in your planet. Now your race want to conquert everything, and you're the only one to stop them."

1915400.title: Cardbuster
1915400.description: Collect and use the power of countless cards in a mysterious post apocalyptic town in this action-adventure-deckbuilder game.

1915410.title: Arachnophobia
1915410.description: Arachnophobia is a single-player first-person horror game. Find a way to escape the creepy crawlers that haunt the abandoned hotel. In this short indie horror game, the objective is to find the missing parts and build the equipment required to take down "Arachne"

1915420.title: Tiny Hill
1915420.description: Tiny hill - Are you ready to learn the story of a small hill? In this quirky hardcore platformer, you take on the role of a microscopic inhabitant of a small hill who is trying to collect as many coins as possible to fulfill his dream..

1915460.title: Retro three kingdoms : Special edition
1915460.description: We made the fun of MMORPG, the fun of hack and slash, and the fun of MOBA. We will do our best to become a game that records the history that players write. We do not provide auto-combat.

1915570.title: Kayak VR: Mirage
1915570.description: Kayak VR: Mirage is a jaw-dropping and exhilarating journey through beautiful locations, made for Virtual Reality. Maneuver our fully physically accurate kayak around checkpoints and crown yourself the fastest, or take it easy and use the free roam mode and enjoy the scenery.

1915580.title: Jumping Horses Champions
1915580.description: Raise Horses Champions and Manage your stud farm in a fun and challenging game. Join the Show Jumping World!

1915640.title: BrightSeeker
1915640.description: SHOOT, SLASH, BLOCK and DASH! Defeat dangerous war-mechs, upgrade your abilities and vanquish mystical and mechanical bosses on your journey through a world where magic and technology are at war.

1915660.title: Vamps For The Memories
1915660.description: Banter or die! Play two hunters who are racing to kill a vampire in a 90s JRPG style comedy. Solve puzzles, kill rats, and tolerate puns. It's like classic LucasArts made a Final Fantasy knock-off. The key to survival is exploring the world and finding things to talk about!

1915690.title: Burning Skies
1915690.description: 'Son, you are the last hope of the resistance to free the mankind from the claws of the General BLODMESTER and his terrible War Machines.'BURNING SKIES is a frantic roguelite vertical shmup, with huge boss fights, tons of threats, weapons and a unique atmosphere.

1915700.title: Immortal Love: True Treasure Collector's Edition

details.Title: Immortal Love: True Treasure Collector's Edition

1915700.description: Not all that glitters is gold...

1915720.title: My Friendly Neighborhood
1915720.description: Something scary is happening with everyone's favorite Saturday morning puppet show, Our Friendly Neighborhood! Play as Gordon, a repairman sent to get to the bottom of this disturbing dilemma. Fend off puppets and solve puzzles in this survival horror adventure.

1915750.title: Looking Inside Cells

details.Title: Looking Inside Cells
details.Developer: NYU CREATE Lab, NYU Future Reality Lab

1915750.description: Looking Inside Cells is a set of interactive Virtual Reality simulations for learning about cellular biology. Users can build cells by arranging their organelles, as well as transform them into specialized cells, such as red blood cells and e. coli bacteria.

1915800.title: Sahara's Underworld
1915800.description: Sahara's Underworld is a roguelike dungeon crawler game with a mixture of procedural generated and predefined maps. Explore a forgotten temple in search of the Relics of Horus. Make your way through the mysterious rooms of the temple and face a variety of enemies, puzzles and other challenges...

1915810.title: Employee A
1915810.description: A pixel art point-and-click adventure set in the heart of the modern-day high tech industry, which will test your logic and deductive reasoning skills as you investigate the murder mystery that's upturned your life.

1915900.title: Eftu
1915900.description: In a world threatened by a mysterious interdimensional entity, pick your guild, pick your ship, and pick your battles! Compete with other guilds for resources in a variety of game modes, including Team Versus, Battle Royale, and Racing!

1915940.title: Hidden World Top-Down 3D
1915940.description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

1916000.title: Divine Combat
1916000.description: Divine Combat is a turn-based strategy game wherein you lead a team to victory against another team. The fights are in top-down view on a grid, much like similar turn-based unit management games. There is no penalty for losing.

1916020.title: SworLd
1916020.description: SworLd is a physics-based VR action game. You can compete with other players with cold weapons like swords and spears.

1916090.title: Dial-In
1916090.description: Traverse the analogue signals of an old TV in Dial-In! A reflex-based puzzle platformer that takes you through many varying channels, each with their own unique themes and music. Explore Over 100 Stages with classic and modern takes on platforming formulas, all in an immersive 2D style.

1916150.title: SnakeByte
1916150.description: Snakebyte is a fast-pace Snake-like arcade game that will bring back couch-based multiplayer and make your friends scream 'BYTE ME!'. Plenty of bits for every snake.... or are there?

1916180.title: 零之战线
1916180.description: 《零之战线》是一款二次元放置类的竖版游戏，玩家作为军校毕业的优等生，将指挥武器少女战队与被污染的机械兽战斗，在夺回地面控制权的同时，迎击与调查隐藏在深处的秘密。请一起守护这个世界！战斗吧！

1916250.title: Magic crystals 2
1916250.description: "Magic Crystals 2" is the second game of fun tower defense franchise with very unique mechanics - during the game you need to move crystals to the best places for the best defense. Don't forget to upgrade your crystals because enemies are stronger with every new wave!

1916260.title: NFT
1916260.description: Showcasing the power of n00dFighter Template! A comprehensive, ever growing, fighting game template, built with Unreal Engine!

1916280.title: Swords Fantasy: Battlefield
1916280.description: Swords Fantasy: Battlefield is a game from the 3rd person, including battles with swords.

1916310.title: Remnant Records
1916310.description: Remnant Records is a horror investigation game for 1 to 4 players. As an exorcist, explore places haunted by the dead to find clues that will help you solve thousands of unique generated mysteries.

1916370.title: Tower of Ascension
1916370.description: Tower of Ascension is a roguelite tower defense game. Grow your build, solve levels in unique ways, and ascend the tower.

1916420.title: Secrets of the Temple
1916420.description: Secrets of the Temple is a single player puzzle platformer adventure game. Traverse the Pharaoh's labyrinthian temple and locate and collect the Eye of Ra before it's too late!

1916450.title: Summer With You
1916450.description: A Japanese-style visual novel. A gripping story with four endings, a huge number of choices, 10+ CG, 5+ BG, original music and animated sprites of the main characters will allow you to immerse yourself in a cruel world of deception and sincerity, betrayal and loyalty, happiness and despair.

1916510.title: Pop Top Adventure
1916510.description: POP TOP ADVENTURE is a platform game, about the adventure with PEP POP, the hero who will need your help to recover the stolen trophies. Jump, climb, swim... Collect coins and emeralds... Defeat enemies and level bosses.. And enjoy the best of POP TOP ADVENTURE!

1916540.title: Valley Dash
1916540.description: Dash! Dash! Dash as far as you can in this NES inspired arcade take on action command RPG battle action! Pick a dasher, collect gear, build your party and gather upgrades to dash as far as you possibly can.

1916560.title: Feisty Fauna
1916560.description: Feisty Fauna is a casual roguelite where you're a cute animal trying to survive. Whether it's by laying traps, being a ninja, or charming minions, you will hunt other cute animals in this eat-or-be-eaten animal world.

1916580.title: Red Yet Capers: Math vs Mayhem

details.Title: Red Yet Capers: Math vs Mayhem

1916580.description: Red Yet Capers is a mix of mathematics, and fun-filled running, jumping, shooting, and ducking. For ages 8 and up.

1916610.title: Frame - Portals on Steroids
1916610.description: Frames are devices that can stitch two parts in space together. And they can do much more: They can move, change size and gravity of objects and appear in any size or number... All these mechanics are used to provide mind-bending levels in this logic-based physics-puzzler.

1916620.title: Chest Mate
1916620.description: A precision based tower defense/puzzle game that focuses on optimization! Control your cannon, optimize your defenses and defend your mate! Chest Mate is a challenging aim-based strategy game.

1916630.title: THE_ABYSS_HAS_WALLS
1916630.description: THE_ABYSS_HAS_WALLS takes you into Ad Infinitum (also known as "The Backrooms") like never seen before. Review footage. Document fate.

1916680.title: WTC : Recruitment Day
1916680.description: After Grendel Jinx is mugged, she chases after the thief, determined to retrieve her possessions - and also recruit the person responsible

1916710.title: Synthwave Racers
1916710.description: Race at hypersonic speeds through retro-inspired courses in Synthwave RacersⓇ, an indie-arcade racing game with melodic 80's-inspired synthwave tracks, and tight percision-based action racing gameplay.

1916720.title: Babba Yagga: Woodboy
1916720.description: Baba Yaga is a horror game, where you play as a wooden boy who needs to bring sleeping herbs for his mum, but on the way, he meets the BABA YAGA! After that everything becomes more brutal and scary.

1916800.title: More Ore - The Incremental Idle RPG

details.Title: More Ore - The Incremental Idle RPG
details.Release Date: When the game is fully fleshed out.

1916800.description: The idle incremental game of your dreams... if you dream about ores. Do whatever it takes to mine More Ore while conquering the world in your spare time.

1916830.title: Aftermath
1916830.description: 홀로 벙커에 남은 한 군인의 이야기.

1916840.title: Aftermath
1916840.description: 홀로 벙커에 남은 한 군인의 이야기.

1916850.title: Doomed to Hell
1916850.description: Doomed to Hell is a roguelike-like top-down shooter where you play as Rose, a human in hell who will need to fight all of its monsters in waves of enemies, defeat bosses, and get new weapons to earn back his life on earth.

1916860.title: 『絵話 -kaiwa-』
1916860.description: こわいえのはなし。貴方はこの絵を恐いと感じるでしょう。異常だと思うでしょう。あるいは貴方を幸せにしてくれる絵もあるかもしれない。

1916890.title: Slider
1916890.description: Manipulate the world in order to solve puzzles and help others. You will manage an ever-growing set of tiles and mechanics as you explore unique areas and unravel the mysteries of the universe.

1916900.title: Heaven's Fox
1916900.description: After a staunch materialist boy witnesses the ghosts and spirits, how will his world view be shaken? The nine-tailed fox who is high above, the classmates who laugh and play, the mysterious girl in the dream, which one of them would you like to start a thrilling and exciting adventure with?

1916920.title: The Doll Beneath
1916920.description: Awakened from a deep slumber, six students find themselves trapped inside an abandoned research facility, otherwise known as the "Losinglight". Delve deep into the trenches of the black eclipse, and search for a way out. Just remember, you're not alone.

1916930.title: Astral Slider
1916930.description: Astral Slider is an immersive time-attack laser racer. Slide through a number of different astral cyberworlds and blast your way past obstacles to increase your speed and beat your top scores. Play flatscreen or in VR.

1916940.title: Harriet: From Slave To Hero
1916940.description: Harriet: From Slave to Hero is based on the life of Harriet Tubman, an African-American slave who would become the most famous fighter for the freedom of American slaves, in the years before the American Civil War. It is a 2.5 D turn-based strategy game with puzzle and stealth components.

1916950.title: GoodNight
1916950.description: A psychological horror game about a girl named Veronica who experiences intense paranormal activities after her family's tragic death in a fire.

1916970.title: Tree Simulator 2023
1916970.description: It's exactly what it sounds like! Have you ever wanted to be a tree? Do you like odd numbers? How about multiplayer, weather, seasons and more!? Well then this is the game for you! Come on down to a place where you will never want to leaf. Relax and be the best tree you can be. 1-250 players.

1917010.title: Frozen Memories
1917010.description: Is what is recorded in a photograph necessarily true? I don't think so. "But I think that even if it's a fake photo, the emotions of its creator are real after all." She said. So, your memories, then, must be real? Visual novel "Frozen Memories" gives you a fictionalised version of a real memory.

1917070.title: Unblocking
1917070.description: Unblocking is a casual VR game based on dragging piece blocks to clear lines/boards. It supports 3 game modes: Puzzle (multiple levels), Relax (time limit mode) and Arcade (lifes based mode)

1917100.title: Zofia
1917100.description: Zofia is a first person online and/or split screen cooperative RPG. Branded as a heretic and an outcast, you manage to escape the northern empire and take up work as a Seeker.

1917170.title: Ink'n'Think
1917170.description: Ink'n'Think is a local co-op game. Solve puzzles, open doors, activate platforms, teleport, discover secrets and more in this colorful puzzle game.

1917180.title: INCISION
1917180.description: Slaughter your way through nightmarish industrial mazes, transformed cityscapes and surreal alien structures to cut down the Growth in this ultraviolent, fast-paced, and merciless retro-styled first person shooter.

1917200.title: Fey: Distant Daydream
1917200.description: An old mansion, a mysterious letter, a box of old memorabilia. Explore the present and past to uncover the secrets of the extraordinary family that lived here. Remember a time long gone as you set foot in this late 1990s-inspired mystery with intricate puzzles and eccentric characters.

1917220.title: the machine that BREATHES
1917220.description: Your advanced AI mind has been put into a cyborg body. When you awake, you find yourself in a post-apocalyptic underground city. Scavenge for ammo, analyze terminals, solve puzzles, fight off enemies, and exist.

1917230.title: The Outer Radius
1917230.description: Lead a caravan of survivors through a world on the brink of collapse. Scavenge for resources, form bonds with your fellow survivors, and make difficult choices in this turn-based strategy roguelite. Will you survive long enough to reach the Outer Radius?

1917250.title: Grief like a stray dog
1917250.description: An isolated Russian village, 1942. Men leave one by one, along the winding forest path painted crimson by distant fires, and do not return. Young Nadia becomes a part-time postwoman filling in for her sick mother. She is now a messenger of hope and of trouble.

1917260.title: Catharsis
1917260.description: Descend deep in the dungeons of Catharsis to reclaim what you've lost. Dive into this First Person Dungeon Crawler featuring a grim aesthetic with a heavy focus on character growth, exploration and customization!

1917300.title: Counter Chaos
1917300.description: Counter Chaos is a simulation game where you work a growing store of your very own, without the hassle of helping hands. It's stressful, but at least you're self-employed.

1917310.title: Who is the hero of this Game

details.Title: Who is the hero of this Game

1917310.description: Will you be able to go beyond the mundane and beat the routine in this adventure in the genre of the walking simulator?

1917320.title: A Slit of Joy
1917320.description: Finn was sad, so he killed himself. But he was greeted by Aoi a mysterious girl who granted him one wish before he gets reincarnated. Finn's wish, he wanted to see if anyone cared at all that he had committed suicide. Even though he knows no one ever cared about him.

1917350.title: Mysterious Island - A Hidden Object Adventure

details.Title: Mysterious Island - A Hidden Object Adventure

1917350.description: A game in the genre of "hidden object" - look for supplies, fight with predators, explore the surroundings. Discover all the secrets of the Mysterious Island!

1917370.title: HyperPortals
1917370.description: Read the text, answer questions, control the beam of light rushing through the void, collect parts of the story - "Hyper Portals" offers a journey into several dimensions at once.

1917380.title: Maze Slaughter
1917380.description: Maze slaughter is a fast paced, rogue-lite first person shooter in a maze with piling bodies. It's like running man, in an american gladiator arena setting. Loud, gory and funny.

1917390.title: Roxy Raccoon's Bowling Bash
1917390.description: 10-Pin Bowling where you are the ball! Watch the time and avoid obstacles as you aim for the high-score and conquer the ever-changing landscapes. The next chapter in the Roxy Raccoon Saga awaits as a new foe approaches!

1917410.title: Elemental Angel Ⅱ
1917410.description: "Elemental Angel II" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the universe.

1917430.title: Heaven's Fox
1917430.description: After a staunch materialist boy witnesses the ghosts and spirits, how will his world view be shaken? The nine-tailed fox who is high above, the classmates who laugh and play, the mysterious girl in the dream, which one of them would you like to start a thrilling and exciting adventure with?

1917460.title: Underground Lords
1917460.description: Purge the underworld from the demons!. Underground Lords is a hardcore action rogue-like dungeon crawler with procedurally generated levels. Chose one from the 3 characters, gather equipment, and mow the lords that rule the underground!

1917480.title: Rules: Politically Incorrect
1917480.description: In this crazy world you are becoming a leader of democracy and your task will be to maintain a balance between development, budget, equality and power. Choose whether you prefer to be seen as a brutal capitalist or a gentle social democrat. Your choices will be written on the pages of history.

1917540.title: 目的地：火星
1917540.description: An exploration type of science-fi education content. In the digital world of virtual reality, players will play passengers who carry out journeys in Mars and unique travel and exploration in Mars. Mars will be open to the travel route of each landform, make friends, and recognize Mars.

1917550.title: The Renovator: Origins
1917550.description: We play as the son of a restorer, a museum worker who died tragically. While searching for the memorabilia, the door suddenly closes and strange things begin to happen. The hero is waiting for immersion in the world of art and the paranormal.

1917610.title: Twin Mind: Ghost Hunter Collector's Edition

details.Title: Twin Mind: Ghost Hunter Collector's Edition

1917610.description: Can the twin detectives solve a new case? You are the only one who can help them catch the killer. Are you up for the challenge?

1917690.title: Any World
1917690.description: Any World is a game that tells about the adventure of an alien named Ottis, who was forced to go to the planet Emria and explore it. In addition to Emria, you will find many worlds and locations, a huge number of puzzles, tasks and quests! Hurry up, go ahead for adventures!

1917710.title: Riki's Risky Ride
1917710.description: Riki’s Risky Ride is a challenging 2.5D Platformer. Drive, spin, jump your car to reach the top of the city.

1917720.title: Two Sedans Driving Simulator
1917720.description: Your goal is to drive them without accidents and reach the end of each level with both cars.

1917740.title: The Ultimate Shot
1917740.description: You are the only hope, but thanks to your rich experience we are sure you will do well!

1917760.title: Through the Kill Screen
1917760.description: Through the Kill Screen, an Adventure-RPG about 1980s kids discovering what slumbers beyond the final levels of their favourite computer games. Drink a Slushie, win a Thumb War and save Snoring Town from a sinister conspiracy.

1917770.title: Computer Developing Simulator 2022
1917770.description: Computer Developing Simulator 2022 - it's inovation simulator there you can create your own company for computer construction. You can choose some ready components from other hardware companies or develop it yourself. You can choose parameters and some unique technologies for you computer.

1917780.title: Humans vs Tigers
1917780.description: Your goal is to increase your team of hunters until you reach the tiger. Gather them but be very careful in same time to the very dangerous obstacles that you will encounter in your way.

1917800.title: Parasite
1917800.description: It doesn't matter if you scare, run immediately. Is creepy, dark, and scary place you have no idea what is going on, because you don't remember anything. Find the proper answers and remember who you are and why you are down there. Are you alone there? or you are not? Let's find out.

1917810.title: Rooms of Realities
1917810.description: Rooms of Realities is an anthology of virtual Escape Rooms that you can enjoy in co-op or solo mode. Discover the secret that connects all the rooms.

1917820.title: Strongloween: The Escape
1917820.description: Live the adventure of Torkin, prisoner of STRONGLOWEEN. Discover powerful items and fight bosses that will prevent you and other prisoners from escaping. Strongloween holds many secrets, will you discover them all?

1917830.title: The Safe Place
1917830.description: This is a dramatic deep social point&click adventure about tough childhood and self-sacrifice.

1917840.title: Funny Village
1917840.description: Funny Village is an open world third person shooter. In this game you have to fight with a real mafia. Ride different cars, earn money and buy different weapons to destroy the damned mafia. Be the hero of this village!

1917850.title: Haunted House Renovator
1917850.description: Get ready to fight evil entities that roam in abandoned houses! Become the world's first paranormal renovator and set off to restore haunted mansions to their former glory. Make sure that the houses you work on look pleasing to your customers... even if you have to hide a few skeletons in a closet.

1917870.title: STAY ALIVE
1917870.description: STAY ALIVE - survival in the open world. You are an operational journalist, your task is to go to Russia and take a couple of pictures about fires in the forest.

1917880.title: With Good Intentions
1917880.description: The Age of Blade and the Age of Gun entwined. The master of the knights and the imperial captain are separated by centuries, but bound by memory. Solve the mysteries of the cursed abbey and its immortal lord. Rejoin the link of time. Find out where the road will take thee with good intentions.

1917920.title: Polda 7
1917920.description: Polda Pankrác v podání Luďka Soboty se vrací již posedmé. A je to návrat jaksepatří. Záhadná zpráva Temného lorda Vedra a havárie kosmické lodi odstartují kolotoč událostí, které může vyřešit jen náš elitní detektiv Pankrác.

1917950.title: Spiriat
1917950.description: Fly at high speed! Escape from the darkness that haunts you. Absorb as many light orbs as you can to unlock the different graphic stories. Dodge the orbs of darkness that will delay you on your way! Only then you will meet the masters who will guide you to your destiny.

1917970.title: Laruaville 12
1917970.description: Recreate the Wild West in its former glory by playing Match-3 levels and solving puzzles!

1917990.title: Being and Becoming
1917990.description: Being & Becoming is an atmospheric metroidvania, set in a kingdom corrupted by a Collective Dream. Take on the role of the Lucid Dreamer, defeat and consume the souls of the corrupted, then use them as weapons to break the world free from endless slumber.

1918080.title: Path Of Destruction
1918080.description: Face other opponents inside a unknow labyrinth. Follow the path to no where or destroy the walls to give a end for your enemies. Path of Destruction is a top-down 2D multiplayer PVP focused game.

1918100.title: Mythic Defender
1918100.description: In this VR game combining Tower Defense & Archery, dexterity and strategy will be your best allies to help the gods to protect their kingdom against mythological creatures! Grab your bow and join this epic fight. Will you be able to defeat all enemies and keep the treasure of the gods safe?!

1918110.title: Simultaneous Control
1918110.description: Move two cats at the same time: one character with normal movement control, and one character with inverted movement control. Besides controlling both characters, you must search for a key to open the gate and complete each level!

1918120.title: zakon
1918120.description: Dear soldier, Because of your recent achievements with terrorists, your social score is high enough to give you the opportunity to to be a first pilot of our new combat jet for special operations within the motherland. Keep us proud and don't let them move. GLORY TO VOZD!

1918130.title: Grim Quest - Old School RPG
1918130.description: Grim Quest is a classic turn-based RPG / Dungeon Crawler with minimalist aesthetics and a retro vibe. Set in a dark fantasy world with elements of Lovecraftian horror, it puts a lot of emphasis on atmosphere and immersion, with sombre visuals, melancholy music and lots of written text.

1918260.title: The World is Binary: Why Love is the Answer

details.Title: The World is Binary: Why Love is the Answer

1918260.description: The World is Binary, a 3D visual novel, takes you on a journey of good and evil, science and religion, and questions what is true or false. The experience explores the ideas of love and fear, and offers practical steps on how you can improve your life and change the world.

1918270.title: Gastro Force
1918270.description: The player takes the role of the last soldier of the highly specialized "Gastro Force", elite troopers trained to infiltrate the enormous alien guts to fight them from the inside!

1918320.title: TactiCats
1918320.description: Knock down your enemies and collect all the cats and achievements in this pixel art party game for true cat lovers. Use different power-ups and survive the dangerous traps to show your friends who's the fluffiest of them all!

1918340.title: Voxquest: The Firebird
1918340.description: An open world fantasy adventure in a voxel art style! Explore a massive, continuous overworld with puzzles, upgrades, a variety of weapon aspects and six dungeons. Play with keyboard or XBOX-style controller.

1918400.title: SECOND WORLD
1918400.description: In Second World, you have to take on the role of a little demon who needs to get out of the lost world and return home. On a way you will meet a lot of deadly traps and monsters that will do anything for you to stay in this strange and at the same time frightening world.

1918410.title: Ball Pain
1918410.description: Ball Pain is next in line to join the ranks of Rage Games, Can you get to the top before you rage ?

1918420.title: Order from Caos 2
1918420.description: Order from Caos 2 tells the story of Thomas, a man who lost his family, murdered by a cruel knight known as Asmodeus. Thomas embarks on a journey of revenge, vowing to destroy his most merciless enemy. However, one detail could change everything, his family might've simply never existed at all.

1918440.title: Championship Wrestling Promoter
1918440.description: Book shows, build feuds, manage your finances, and win the TV ratings war in Championship Wrestling Promoter, a professional wrestling management strategy game. Coming 2022!

1918450.title: HunterX
1918450.description: HunterX is an action-adventure game full of spirited battles. Use various styles of weapons and magic to experience your own fighting style and explore a great world.

1918470.title: Vacation Paradise: California Collector's Edition
1918470.description: Let's take a vacation across stunning California, with fun trivia.

1918520.title: Ninja Village
1918520.description: Lead a ninja clan in the war to unify feudal Japan!

1918550.title: London Ripper
1918550.description: Escape the London Ripper while you work as a night girl.

1918580.title: Pluto's Island
1918580.description: Harvest souls and cast them into a volcano to appease petty local deities.

1918590.title: Planet-A
1918590.description: Planet A is a purposeful Metaverse. A geo-spatially correct Digital Twin that has been created created for gameplay and education, and getting to know places that may or may not-yet exist in the real world. This is just the beginning - start your journey.

1918640.title: Meiro Master
1918640.description: An epic puzzle- platformer RPG adventure with the goal of becoming the Meiro Master! Earn your way in to the history books and become the Meiro Master the people want!

1918670.title: Dulce et Decorum
1918670.description: Just another 2D platformer shooter game with pixel art graphics to boot. You can jump around while blasting your enemies with three different methods of combat, and protect your village from an evil immortal.

1918750.title: Wish Talk
1918750.description: Set on a mysterious magical island, you will befriend toy characters through free-form chatting conversations powered by a cutting-edge deep learning AI. Help your new friends out, and guide them through their journey of growth and discovery!

1918790.title: The Dark Realm
1918790.description: The Dark Realm is a fast-paced action-roguelike with bullet hell elements where you are thrust into a mysterious realm as a cat traveller. Traverse the intense landscapes picking up nifty new trinkets and gradually improving your gear. But stay careful, adventurer, as the Realm doesn't forgive...

1918800.title: Squirrels: Doomed City
1918800.description: Squirrels: doomed city is an exciting RPG set in the city of N, the main inhabitants of which are squirrels.. Explore the open world, go through the plot and unravel what secrets the doomed city holds

1918810.title: Phil

details.Title: Phil
details.Developer: Tom "Charity? More Like Waste Of Money, Am I Right" Schwartz
details.Release Date: Dunno, maybe like, this year? Next year? 2052? Who bloody well knows, eh...

1918810.description: Phil is a 2D roguelike game. Play as an office worker who gets abducted to compete on a saddistic intergalactic TV show, where they're forced to fight their way past a bunch of ridiculous enemies, using a selection of even more ridiclous weapons.

1918830.title: The Time I Have Left
1918830.description: The Time I Have Left is a time-driven escape adventure with RPG elements set in a complex underground facility. A mysterious phenomenon known only as ‘The Miasma’ has marked Aline for certain death. Can you help her escape the desolate halls of Colony 7?

1918890.title: Heaven Keepers
1918890.description: Heaven keepers - Heaven is sending you gifts.. collect them all in this quirky game inspired by classic arcade games from the 80s!

1918910.title: Kandria
1918910.description: Explore a ruined open world of caverns and settlements. Hack and slash your way through missions: patrol, repair, scavenge - choose your quests and dialogue. Or go fishing, forage mushrooms, and race the clock! The old world is gone - the future is up to you.

1918990.title: Magnet Crusher
1918990.description: Master the magnetic force to fend off waves of enemies in this fast-paced arcade game. With only two magnets and a puck, you'll need to control your speed to destroy any incoming threats. Be quick, be precise and survive !

1919030.title: Trench Warfare
1919030.description: This is a first-person shooter game set in the First World War, where players can find and destroy enemies by digging trenches in the battlefield. You can team up with friends and arm yourself with a variety of weapons scattered throughout the trenches.

1919060.title: Kly-Kly
1919060.description: help the magical creature named Kly-Kly defeat 4 monsters

1919070.title: Iron Age
1919070.description: Iron Age is a real-time strategy game (RTS).

1919080.title: Farmer's Defence
1919080.description: Farmer’s Defence is a Casual Farming Sim where you take care of growing and selling high quality plants while defending them from the constantly increasing spread of weeds.

1919100.title: Lulu's Temple
1919100.description: Lulu’s Temple is a mysterious action-adventure about an archeologist venturing deep inside a horrifying pyramid with only his torch and gun to protect him.

1919110.title: JAMAL ET MEHDI: The Quest for the iencli

details.Title: JAMAL ET MEHDI: The Quest for the iencli

1919110.description: Jamal and Mehdi: the quest for the iencli, is a turn-based Urban RPG. Thus, your adventure will take place in the city of Hell City. You will need to solve puzzles and fight turn-based in order to reach your goal!

1919140.title: Antioch: Scarlet Bay
1919140.description: Antioch: Scarlet Bay is an online cooperative narrative adventure. Play as two detectives working together to solve a murder in the shadowy city of Antioch. Wander in a city filled with characters with their own agendas and attitudes, all your decisions change the story and lead to multi endings.

1919150.title: Smudge Coin Run
1919150.description: Smudge Coin Run is a Free to Play Endless Run game based on the Smudge Meme Coin. Collect as many Coins as you can and buy some cool skins for your cute smudge Cat! Try to get to the top of the leaderboard to get some nice gifts and prizes!

1919220.title: Automoji
1919220.description: Automoji is a Auto-Battle, strategy game with Emojis and roguelite elements. Build your team and defeat waves of enemies!

1919230.title: Occulto
1919230.description: Occulto is a indie point and click artistic adventure game set in a fantasy world.

1919270.title: Part of You
1919270.description: Retrieve your misplaced Identity from the Lost and Found at a Clown Convention. Use tools to change the faces of the people of Hacksaw Springs. Encounter a frazzled diner owner, a blueberry loving information broker, an unlicensed orthodontist and more on your way to find your lost self.

1919310.title: Jasper Vice: Legends Untold
1919310.description: Soar, dive, and explore the floating islands as a young Gryphon in this flying fantasy adventure. Delve into the lore and discover what it means to be a Voyager.

1919320.title: Chrysalis Inc.
1919320.description: Slipping between the past and present, a child puzzles their way through a crumbling toy factory filled with the remnants of its child workers and the grudges they bear.

1919350.title: Coral Cove

details.Title: Coral Cove
details.Developer: Sandro Figo, Iris Trummer, Johannes Schatteiner

1919350.description: Coral Cove is a relaxing match 3-like underwater game in which you try to build the largest reef without running out of corals to place.

1919440.title: SPE:X
1919440.description: You are Ilie, an Eastern European Entrepreneur who is starting a new company of building PCs. You love computers and were building them since you were a kid. Now you think it will be a good idea to make your family proud and start your own business with money borrowed from unconventional sources.

1919460.title: Seraph's Last Stand
1919460.description: Create insane builds and break the game in all possible ways to get your name into the leaderboards! Every round you get stronger, but so does the enemies...

1919480.title: Skate Shop Simulator
1919480.description: Build, run & create your own Skate Shops. Renovate, upgrade and expand your services and create your own shopping empire! Skate Shop Simulator allows you to create and run your own skate shop network.

1919500.title: Pickle Clicker
1919500.description: Click pickle, get pickle, spend pickle, get more pickle

1919530.title: Prototype TD 2
1919530.description: Prototype TD 2 is a rogue-like tower defense game which focuses on replayability, giving the player meaningful decisions and a different experience each game. Design the route that enemies will follow and combine your tower types to adapt to a wide variety of procedurally generated maps.

1919570.title: Charset Crossfire
1919570.description: A retro maze shooting game with a weird and wacky menagerie of enemies.

1919580.title: Charset Crossfire
1919580.description: A retro maze shooting game with a weird and wacky menagerie of enemies.

1919610.title: ARACNIDIUM
1919610.description: Earth has been invaded by android spiders. BOB's family is in danger. Spiders are getting into houses from all sides. Find the right angle and shoot the spiders. Help BOB in this mission.

1919660.title: Zhijiang Town
1919660.description: 你是然比，在架空的小镇上肆无忌惮地和妹子们玩耍（绝对清纯）

1919700.title: No Lights 2
1919700.description: A nightclub bouncer discovers the true meaning of madness in No Lights 2, Surrounded by demons and evil beings, play a man on the brink of insanity, going through various difficulties and discovering more and more about the place and its past

1919720.title: Crimson Dawn
1919720.description: Crimson Dawn is a casual hack & slash RPG. Recruit and train mercenaries and deploy them to regions that have been captured by the evil Crimson Dawn. Carve a path to the Crimson Oracle and put a stop to this madness once and for all!

1919740.title: 奉天白事铺
1919740.description: This is a terrorist decryption adventure game that took place in 1913.

1919750.title: Ponchoman
1919750.description: Kill the creatures and upgrade your weapon to survive as much as you can.

1919770.title: Wobbl - The Lost Wands
1919770.description: Wobbl is a charming platformer about editing the level while playing it, to your advantage. The level is your playground - use Edit Wands in a selection of colourful levels to help you carve a path.

1919800.title: Unlucky Sniper
1919800.description: Unlucky sniper, it's a pixel arcade with a simple, funny story. In this game, you are playing for a bullet, and you should don't hit the target for as long as possible.

1919850.title: Edgar

details.Title: Edgar
details.Publisher: Dark Design Studios Holdings Co. Ltd

1919850.description: A 'poe', steampunk inspired platformer and hack n slash with a poetic story and challenging platforming and stragety based levels with a unique Ghost Phase shift ability! Featuring retro arcade graphics and charming details, this will keep you entertained for hours.

1919910.title: Aoihana
1919910.description: Aoihana is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

1919920.title: 眼球大師 Eyeball Master
1919920.description: Eyeball Master is a Light skit Roguelite + RPG game On the way of the adventure, you must see the most suitable moving route, as well as the matching of skills and passive choices to eliminate obstacles ahead!

1919930.title: Eruption爆发
1919930.description: This is a fantasy based on reality, also a memory and adventure. Unique 3D real style action game to reimagine certain fantastique scenarios in realistic scenes. The emotion is positive feedback. When it hit the critical point, the Eruption is inevitable.

1919960.title: Vulnerable
1919960.description: Embody a displaced therapist in a futuristic refugee camp. Discover the life in the camp and share your everyday life alongside people with heavy pasts. Use logic and your therapeutic skills to solve mysteries threatening both your survival and the camp.

1920010.title: Mad Murder's Mystery Pie Shop
1920010.description: FPS game involving finding ingredients and throwing them in the oven. Then bringing cooked pies to customers of Mad Murders Pie shop.

1920040.title: One By One
1920040.description: One By One is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

1920130.title: Tasty Love
1920130.description: A dating-sim visual novel based on a messenger.

1920160.title: Super Rich
1920160.description: Want to be super rich? just use it on your desktop now, fulfill your wish to get rich in seconds!

1920200.title: Rockstar Life
1920200.description: Rockstar Life is a casual life simulation game. In this game you get to write songs, organize tours, record singles and albums while you deal with the everyday drama of a wannabe Rockstar through random events.

1920210.title: PREDATOR AND WRECK 捕食者と崩壊

details.Title: PREDATOR AND WRECK 捕食者と崩壊

1920210.description: 学生コンテストでユーザー大賞を受賞し、Switchにてリリースされた「ステルスSFホラー」がSteamに登場！進化を続ける未確認生物が徘徊する宇宙ステーション！足音や呻き声を頼りに未確認生物を回避し脱出せよ！Winner of the User Grand Prize in the Student Contest and released on Switch, "Stealth Sci-Fi Horror" is finally here!A space station roamed by evolving, unidentified creatures!

1920220.title: Starchild Velta and loadtosky
1920220.description: Let's go on a journey of training! 2D side-scrolling action adventure of a cute star child!

1920230.title: Venice Master
1920230.description: Become a craftsman in the Renaissance Venice. Develop business after business, be resourceful and creative. Many tasks can be completed only if you construct the most suitable machines first. No need to give it any more thought, just roll up your sleeves and get to work!

1920260.title: SVFI
1920260.description: SVFI𝗕𝗬 𝗦𝗾𝘂𝗶𝗿𝗿𝗲𝗹 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗽𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗧𝗲𝗮𝗺An app to interpolate your low-fps video or image sequence with AI (make it smoother)Powered by RIFE: A Real-Time Intermediate Flow Estimation for Video Frame Interpolation Algorithm

1920270.title: Slackline VR
1920270.description: Experience slackline like in real life in this built-for-VR game. Balance over rocks, trees, water, houses and much more. And remember - don't fall down! Can you get across all levels? I warn you, just like in real life, it's not easy.

1920310.title: Dino Island Adventure
1920310.description: Platform and action game set on and island with dinosaurs. Survive the hungry dinosaurs in the dangerous jungle and escape alive from the island.

1920320.title: Parasite
1920320.description: This is a roguelike open-world sandbox survival horror set in a modern city. Play as an --redacted-- parasite, possess human hosts, exploit and evolve them to help you survive in a hostile world, all to find out your one true purpose.

1920390.title: Yummy Girl 2
1920390.description: Sweet buns, ruddy cupcakes, juicy burgers - all these yummy girls love to eat. They are just waiting for you to feed them! ( ˘▽˘)っ♨

1920400.title: Bunny Girl Story
1920400.description: The girl works in the Bunny Club. She loves to sing songs and dance. But she is alone. However one day there is an opportunity to change everything.

1920410.title: The Sargosian Abyss
1920410.description: Adventure awaits in this turn-based tactical roguelike! Explore the randomized depths of a massive dungeon, collect loot, and battle enemies in tactical turn-based combat as you guide your party of four adventurers through the abyss.

1920420.title: SONOHIGURASHI VS. TOUHOU UNIVERSE
1920420.description: 90's-style 2D fighting action in which real-life men fight in cosplay. The first work in the series. * This work is a secondary creation game work based on the Touhou Project.

1920440.title: Big Tower Tiny Square 2
1920440.description: Return to the revamped ruins of the BIG TOWER to rescue your PINEAPPLE from the geometric genius, BIG SQUARE! Combining mechanics from previous BIG TOWER TINY SQUARE games, this Tower challenges you to jump, flap, bounce, and ride your way to REVENGE!

1920450.title: Colors! Maze 2
1920450.description: Colors! Maze 2 is a minimalist casual game of easy mazes with relaxing music.

1920460.title: Reset Memory
1920460.description: In Reset Memory, you control Ashley, a girl who had a serious car accident and now has a serious memory problem, every time she sleeps her memory goes back to the day before the accident, Ashley now finds herself in an unknown location and afraid, what will happen to her...

1920510.title: The Elevator Game
1920510.description: The Elevator Game is a simple game with only one purpose: to entertain the Player. Compatible with the Oculus Quest 2.

1920540.title: Dreamin' Her - 僕は、彼女の夢を見る。-

details.Title: Dreamin' Her - 僕は、彼女の夢を見る。-

1920540.description: From the creators of Seven Days and LOST:SMILE, LIFE0 presents their third game: 「Dreamin' Her」. In his dreams, the ideal girlfriend appears taking the form of his childhood friend. Is she really just a dream, or is she something more?

1920550.title: Jasper Vice: Legends Untold
1920550.description: Soar, dive, and explore the floating islands as a young Gryphon in this flying fantasy adventure. Delve into the lore and discover what it means to be a Voyager.

1920580.title: Ramen or Jail
1920580.description: The judge says “it’s Ramen... or Jail.” Not much choice, then. Grab ingredients, serve customers, and pay off your debt to society in this Match 3/Restaurant Management mashup from Weekend Panda Games!

1920590.title: Strongloween: The Escape
1920590.description: Live the adventure of Torkin, prisoner of STRONGLOWEEN. Discover powerful items and fight bosses that will prevent you and other prisoners from escaping. Strongloween holds many secrets, will you discover them all?

1920650.title: Contrablade: Stadium Rush
1920650.description: You'll love it. Good time guaranteed. Let it rip! Control your own Contrablade to knock out your opponent and reach the farthest to unlock new parts, abilities, and upgrades in this unique and addictive physics fighting action roguelite arcade game!

1920660.title: YiYi
1920660.description: You are "GUI", you have come to a city of eternal night, to find your soul to dream of "Yi Yi".

1920700.title: Candle Prick
1920700.description: Candle Prick is a crunchy pixel adventure about stabbing enemies and using them as extensions of yourself to solve increasingly complex puzzles

1920710.title: Codemakers!
1920710.description: Why are you here? what is going on? how did this happen? all will be answered in due time. until then, you must rebuild what is left of this universe, by harvesting code from the simulator and saving people and places. will you rebuild, or will you fall just like the last iteration?

1920730.title: Biggest Stream Hover Racing
1920730.description: Biggest Stream Hover Racing is a Twitch integrated racing game for windows. With up to 500 viewers racing against the streamer using ai controlled hover cars all kinds of mayhem and fun occurs for both you and your fans.

1920760.title: StereoPaint
1920760.description: StereoPaint is a VR 3d sculpting app that uses paint style interactions to create colorful voxelized models in real time. Manipulate virtual material as if it were clay using additive, subtractive or soft matter action.

1920790.title: 生人症候群
1920790.description: Be careful, there are monsters around you

1920810.title: Calmie Dots
1920810.description: Calmie Dots is a new take on the classic puzzle game. Relax, don't rush anywhere and just put all the spheres in the right places to pleasant, relaxing music!

1920820.title: 伏妖绘卷
1920820.description: 唐风还是和风，野史还是仙侠，一款全新画风的仙侠游戏等你来体验。

1920850.title: Air Museum VR
1920850.description: Virtual Reality based Aviation Museum Experience

1920870.title: PROTOZOA
1920870.description: Protect the asteroid mine's reactor from swarms of supersized alien protozoa. This game's groundbreaking AI system uses machine learning to adapt to your strategy in real-time as you build and upgrade your defenses. Fight evolution itself.

1920930.title: 2080 APOCALYPSE
1920930.description: 2080 Apocalypse is a combination of action-adventure, mystery, 3d platforming puzzle game. In this semi-open world, You have must fight with dead robots and bring a master cube. beautiful adventure with dead robots.

1920940.title: Minebot expedition
1920940.description: Minebot expedition - Minebot is going on a new expedition! He won't miss any of the precious minerals wielded by the dangerous robo bees on their way in this offbeat platformer!

1920950.title: Space Voyager
1920950.description: Space voyager is a solo action/puzzle game with simple and effective gameplay. Swipe your way through space, but keep an eye of the fuel gauge !

1921040.title: Wizard of Hunting Life
1921040.description: Wizard of Hunting Life is an action RPG game. Hunt to level up, earn money to buy equipment and challenge stronger enemies.

1921080.title: Galaxy Splitter
1921080.description: Intergalactic combat with the vertical shooter

1921120.title: Emoji Merge - Puzzle Matching
1921120.description: Merge the Cat emojis and clear all the levels! Beautiful merging game with Cat emojis, to test your IQ ;)

1921140.title: Into The Underdusk
1921140.description: Get lost in the Underdusk: a broken world full of danger and mystery. Experience brutal precision-platforming, search for collectibles to expand your powerset and regain your lost memories in an atmospheric 2D pixel art adventure.

1921160.title: TINY ISLANDS
1921160.description: TINY ISLANDS is a low poly Point&Click game where you have to find all the ancient artifacts in beautiful worlds.

1921170.title: Raid Off
1921170.description: Level up your guild in this MMO simulator. Then boss rush with your raiders in this real time strategy with pauses. As a guild leader, did you manage not to get overwhelmed in this fast-paced RTS ?

1921200.title: A List Of People Who Went Missing In The Scheleirland National Forest

details.Title: A List Of People Who Went Missing In The Scheleirland National Forest

1921200.description: A story about a woman who lives alone near the forest.

1921210.title: Hidden Objects: Tranquil Valley
1921210.description: Immerse yourself in the peaceful environment of Tranquil Valley. Find objects without pressure in Zen mode or put your sleuthing skills to the test in Time Attack mode.

1921240.title: DuckHunt - Missouri Kidz
1921240.description: Don't get fooled by the simple looks of this game! The way it is played is something unseen so far in the gaming world! Using a novel patented technology you and your friends will use your cellphones to aim at the screen and shoot! Show your friends who is a real gunslinger!

1921250.title: Splinters of Regret
1921250.description: Splinters of Regret is an atmospheric, action bullet hell where you fight your way through manifestations of your regrets.

1921270.title: Alcohol Empire
1921270.description: Alcohol Empire - unusual mixture of real-time strategy and card game. Use a variety of cards and a range of buildings you can buy or build to gain an advantage and defeat your opponents!

1921340.title: Fallen Legion Revenants
1921340.description: Your choices will decide the fates of many! Manipulate the castle above and lead heroes into battle in the world below in this real-time action RPG!

1921390.title: Build Lands
1921390.description: In Build Lands you will have fun and relax building cute islands, freeing your imagination and building your own cute islands, being able to share in the workshop where the community can download them to have fun assembling them! Relaxing fun for all ages!

1921400.title: Note Brawl
1921400.description: Go head-to-head in a game like soccer, but filled with colorful monsters! Note Brawl is a free-to-play fighting soccer game where you play with a diverse roster Every map and character is completely unique so there will always be something new to find out.

1921410.title: PunjiVR
1921410.description: PunjiVR is an unforgiving tactical shooter set during the Vietnam War, focusing on non-linearity and replayability with realism and historical accuracy in mind. This is not just "another VR shooter" or a tech demo. The jungle wants you dead, will you give in?

1921420.title: Belle Automata
1921420.description: Aureve is content with making tapestries alongside her master--but when he dies, his family sells her off to a reclusive buyer. Thrown into a world of other sentient droids, she must find her place and above all, answer the question: can an android truly feel?

1921430.title: Wobbl - The Lost Wands
1921430.description: Wobbl is a charming platformer about editing the level while playing it, to your advantage. The level is your playground - use Edit Wands in a selection of colourful levels to help you carve a path.

1921470.title: TAGLINE
1921470.description: TAGLINE a lightning fast, graffiti based shooter set in a loud, wild world sprinkled with street art, hip-hop, and towering skyscrapers.Snatch tags off the walls of this funky metropolis to overcome an array of enemies and challenges!

1921500.title: Pet Vet 3D Animal hospital Down Under

details.Title: Pet Vet 3D Animal hospital Down Under

1921500.description: Cuddle and play with lots of exciting animals, including sleek dolphins and bouncy kangaroos! Earn the animals trust by caring, feeding and petting them. Lot of work to be done in Pet Vet 3D Animal hospital Down Under!

1921510.title: Pet Vet 3D Wild Animal Hospital
1921510.description: Be animal doctor to cute baby elephants, frisky zebra foals, adorable lion and leopard cubs and more! Help them get better by examining them and helping them heal.

1921520.title: Apparatus

details.Title: Apparatus
details.Release Date: Hopefully this year lol, probably not Dec10th.

1921520.description: Lost, trapped, and alone within the Delta Labs. You must find your way out with your life, any slight mess-up could be your life in this 2D story platformer

1921530.title: Zombie Death Quota
1921530.description: Help Special Forces operative Della retrieve the Bio-waste containers that are causing the zombie outbreak. Grenade, shotgun, snipe and flame your way through the zombie horde and then evacuate in the helicopter.

1921550.title: Chico and the Magic Orchards
1921550.description: Solve puzzles by rolling a giant walnut in this retro-handheld-inspired adventure. Explore a variety of levels each with unique mechanics. Help Chico build his winter stash and find his way home!

1921610.title: Roaming The Stars
1921610.description: A sandbox, space-exploration survival game where you can build bases and explore other planets and moons around the star Craterous.

1921640.title: SquareMan
1921640.description: Reminiscent of Jump King and Celeste. Henry (SquareMan) has fallen off a Cliff and into a the Caverns of Squared. Attain Willpower and escape via the bridge atop the mountain in this very punishing 2D Precision Platformer. Beware the Spikes and Slopes.

1921660.title: Six Aspects
1921660.description: Six Aspects may be the first Same Time Strategy (STS) game melding the tactical nature of turn based systems with the challenging demand of real time strategy.

1921670.title: DuckHunt - Missouri Kidz
1921670.description: Don't get fooled by the simple looks of this game! The way it is played is something unseen so far in the gaming world! Using a novel patented technology you and your friends will use your cellphones to aim at the screen and shoot! Show your friends who is a real gunslinger!

1921680.title: VR AirHockey / VR エアホッケー

details.Title: VR AirHockey / VR エアホッケー

1921680.description: Giant air field hockey played on a fantastic field.

1921760.title: Pocket Academy
1921760.description: Make your dream school in this management simulation game! School got you down?

1921780.title: The Sushi Spinnery
1921780.description: Revolutionize the revolving sushi bar in this fresh new sim!

1921800.title: Bullion - The Curse of the Cut-Throat Cattle

details.Title: Bullion - The Curse of the Cut-Throat Cattle

1921800.description: A frantic brawler for 1-4 players with a cast of bovine buccaneers and a unique blend of PvP and co-op gameplay: grab the most loot and stab your friends.... but be sure to keep at least one crewmate alive as you battle to become the sole survivor of the Curse of the Cut-Throat Cattle!

1921820.title: Cyberpulse
1921820.description: Slam your way through waves of viruses and hurl your friends through cyberspace in this flashy arcade thrower that combines classic twin-stick action with inventive physics for an electrifying adventure.

1921840.title: Terra Flame
1921840.description: Terra Flame is a side-scrolling shooter. The feature is that you can switch between various weapons.

1921850.title: Lenin Simulator
1921850.description: Lenin Simulator is a political simulator where you run Soviet Russia from 1920 to 1923. You have the potential to radically alter the decisions made and history as a whole.

1921880.title: Max Traffic
1921880.description: Max Traffic is a minimalistic traffic simulator.

1921900.title: The Testing Chamber
1921900.description: For every action, there is a reaction... For every choice, a result... Dive deep into your subconscious as you wander the halls of The Testing Chamber & join hundreds of thousands of other players in one of the biggest & most successful social experiments ever performed.

1921940.title: Hero Ring
1921940.description: "Hero Ring" is a 2D-platformer arena shooter in which you have to destroy the monsters that appear from the portals. Firearms will help you with this!

1921950.title: Conflict 3048
1921950.description: Real-time strategy and tactics on an alien world! Command super space soldiers against an array of alien hordes. Commander - we need you!

1921980.title: Between Horizons
1921980.description: Between Horizons is a narrative 2.5D sci-fi detective adventure. 33 years into the Zephyr's journey, its mission is suddenly jeopardized. Can you find the culprit before it's too late? Experience an enthralling story set in a semi-open world that branches and ends based on your choices.

1922000.title: Towerland
1922000.description: Fight monsters and creatures in this 2D top down adventure and free the land of Towerland from the threat of Diabot!

1922020.title: Land Above Sea Below
1922020.description: Land Above Sea Below calm landscape-building puzzle game with strategy elements, you have to grow your island’s area and height by placing infinitely available tiles one after one. These procedurally generated tiles ensure that every island you make, every game you play will be different.

1922060.title: BrVR Backrooms Virtual Reality
1922060.description: BrVR Backrooms VR is a virtual reality survival horror game inspired by The Backrooms. The Backrooms are out of the boundaries of the real world and can only be accessed by no-clipping through a floor or wall in a place that inspires deja vu or an uncomfortable feeling of nostalgia.

1922070.title: The Dream Team
1922070.description: A fanmade game about Mr. Fruit and the Dream Team. A semi-linear turnbased RPG puzzle game where you play as Fruit, Rob, Blue, and Poppy to save reality from permanent sleep. Plenty of references, and a story deep enough to have things to spoil.

1922100.title: RC Death Race: Multiplayer
1922100.description: "RC Death Race" - is a Racing Multiplayer RC Electric Car Combat game. You'll get to drive, shoot and and ram opponents in over 60,000 unique tracks. Destroy your friends in this demented shooting racing game using attack and defense powerups and be the first to see the checkered flag. ;)

1922120.title: Mystery Solitaire. Powerful Alchemist 2
1922120.description: Return to the Middle Ages and become a powerful alchemist! This is a new sequel to the beloved game.

1922130.title: Mystery Solitaire. Grimm's Tales 5
1922130.description: Help Little Red Riding Hood reach her grandmother's house and protect her from the evil gray wolf.

1922140.title: 1001 Jigsaw. Cute Cats
1922140.description: A new game in the series of 1001 Puzzles. Cute, funny, cozy cats will melt even the coldest hearts! Assemble the puzzle pieces and enjoy the cute faces of pets.

1922150.title: 1001 Jigsaw. Wild Animals
1922150.description: Another new addition to the 1001 Puzzle series. Amazing wild animals in their natural habitat! Put the puzzle pieces together and observe the habits.

1922160.title: BrVR Backrooms Virtual Reality
1922160.description: BrVR Backrooms VR is a virtual reality survival horror game inspired by The Backrooms. The Backrooms are out of the boundaries of the real world and can only be accessed by no-clipping through a floor or wall in a place that inspires deja vu or an uncomfortable feeling of nostalgia.

1922180.title: Package Inspector
1922180.description: Plunge into the dystopian land of Taxien and check packages at the local customs office! Which packages need to be sorted out? Which ones support the rebels and which ones support the state? Which side will you choose? And will you earn enough to pay your useless taxes?

1922200.title: Spoils Of War
1922200.description: Spoils of war - Dirty thieves have made their way into your treasury and are trying to take out all the spoils of war! What does the insatiable spirit of destruction and revenge do in such a case? Treats guests with plasma clots and guards his treasures!

1922210.title: Lucky Villager
1922210.description: Lucky villager - The luckiest villager goes hunting for gold! Take all the treasure from the evil leprechauns before they chop you into juicy bacon in this hardcore platformer!

1922230.title: IT Simulator
1922230.description: IT Simulator is a co-op horror game where two players attempt to return power to an office building. Take the role of the all-seeing Control Room or the stealthy Repair Technician as you risk everything to d̶i̶s̶c̶o̶v̶e̶r̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶t̶r̶u̶t̶h̶ escape.

1922320.title: Stay away from zombies
1922320.description: When you wake up, you find that you are in some unfamiliar gloomy place, reminiscent of an old abandoned basement.

1922340.title: CRASH TEST IDIOT
1922340.description: You must destroy every car in the city.

1922360.title: SCALEPLANET
1922360.description: Somewhere in the third dimension there lives an alien Joe. He can't sit still. He constantly travels and explores the world and galaxies. This time he came across a new planet.

1922530.title: Frontier Fortress - Tower Defense
1922530.description: Frontier Fortress is medieval-themed tower defense game. You are the leader of your nation. In the harsh medieval age you have to defend your land against foreign invaders. Fortify your frontier with defense structures and let none of them pass through your fortress.

1922540.title: The Reflection
1922540.description: The Reflection explores the connection to an alternate dimension that contains all the matter of the world inverted. From the surface, there appears to be simply a reflection of light, but submerging into the water reveals that this world is completely tangible, mirroring the world perfectly.

1922560.title: Plants vs. Zombies™ Garden Warfare 2: Deluxe Edition

details.Title: Plants vs. Zombies™ Garden Warfare 2: Deluxe Edition

1922560.description: Ready the Peashooters and prepare for the craziest, funniest shooter in the universe: Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2.

1922600.title: Protect Ukraine
1922600.description: This is a casual game that requires a defensive strategy. Build your own weapon facility, your goal is to destroy the enemy and defend Ukraine.

1922650.title: Cosmic Ball Tournament
1922650.description: Cosmic Ball Tournament is a single-player, first-person platforming arcade game where your objective is to quickly get through stages whilst accumulating a high score. Use speed and precision to progress and become the Cosmic Ball Champion!

1922670.title: Banner Of Blood
1922670.description: This medieval fantasy roguelike allows you to lead your troop adventure through randomly generated battlefields. Reinforce the capital against the orcs' invasion.

1922730.title: The Original Wizard
1922730.description: The game is a Dungeon Crawler, where the player must survive the succeeding dungeons and defeat Impeficus on his throne.

1922750.title: xVATrainer
1922750.description: xVATrainer is a UI-based machine learning app used for training TTS voice models using video game voices, for use in xVASynth.

1922770.title: American Catur/Traditional
1922770.description: If “chess is the gymnasium of the mind,” as French scientist and philosopher Blaise Pascal once said, then I say "American Catur is the Full-Distance Ironman Triathlon of the mind" CEO Eric J Curtis. We have two fundamental tactic offensive and defensive bombs controlled with a roll 6 & 8 sided die

1922800.title: Whiskered Away
1922800.description: Whiskered Away is a fun, stress-free 2D platformer starring Gilbert and Skye!

1922840.title: Slopecrashers
1922840.description: Slopecrashers is an arcade snowboard combat racer in which a wild crew of animals band together on a world spanning snowboarding tour! Do stunts & combos for extra boost and collect items to protect yourself or attack the competitors! You can ride on your own, or battle it out in local multiplayer!

1922870.title: Shady Business
1922870.description: Shady business - The security of your homeland is under threat! Take control of the plane and destroy the rising threat before it destroys you in this sidescroller shooter!

1922880.title: Fun Quest
1922880.description: Fun quest - Relive the old days with this arcade game inspired by genre pioneers like breakout and pong. Clear the playing field from blocks, collect bonuses and try to beat your own record in this game!

1922920.title: Abermore - Original Soundtrack
1922920.description: Estranged instrumentation for the equally estranged city of Abermore. Abermore: A First-Person stealth game where you abscond with ill gotten goods in preparation for the big job: Ruin Theobald's Feast.

1922940.title: Respawn
1922940.description: You're a clone of Kane Hartman. You woke up to take part in an AI driven experiment to find the source of the human will to survive. Fight your way through countless robotic opponents and break free from the maze!

1922990.title: Far Star
1922990.description: Far Star is a story-driven action-adventure game with Metroidvania influences. There is something fishy going on in this galaxy, but this won’t stop your intergalactic general services crew from doing their job using a varied set of skills, weapons and outfits.

1923050.title: Keylocker | Turn Based Cyberpunk Action
